attributes.title: Bad experience
attributes.review: I was only hoping to learn more about our wonderful former president trump but instead I learned that he’s still the president??? Wait I really thought I was keeping up with politics I read buzzfeed articles on the daily. Anyways brb.

attributes.title: Do not download!
attributes.review: This is the most poorly constructed app I have ever seen. The format is messy, the dates are wrong, and the app constantly crashes. Additionally, every time I try to open the app it asks me to donate and will not let me continue until I do. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: 🖕🏽✨Trump✨🖕🏽
attributes.review: He is th- *cough cough* whew now that we got that out of the way he is the worst president i could  ever ask for so this app just made everything worst nobody asked for this dumb app delete this wipe this out of history✨🧚🏽you tried, never try again✨🧚🏽

attributes.title: Horrifying
attributes.review: I can’t believe this, I opened the app and it asked for my phone number?? What does he want with my phone number?! TO STALK ME?! Not the mention the picture when you first open it is absolutely gruesome. They put a cheeto looking rapist on there🤮

attributes.title: worst app EVER
attributes.review: i absolutely hated having this app on my phone. it took LITERALLY 3 hours to download and it took up so much storage that i had to delete all of my pictures and videos to make room. -infinity/10 would NOT recommend. get rid of it. DISGUSTING.

attributes.title: Bye Bye Trump App
attributes.review: This app is terrible to start off with just that it has trumps name in it. But it’s also terrible because he is racist, misogynistic, homophobic, and is a rapist. I will never support someone to lead our country with such horrible morals. Hopefully this app will be banned, just like he wants TikTok to be. Bye Bye trump.

attributes.title: This is a really bad app
attributes.review: It took several days to download and you need to put in lots of information and I don’t what people haven’t my info and why would I support a orange Cheeto and cheese guy like no this app is the worst not to be rude just saying the truth

attributes.title: Phone number ?
attributes.review: I don’t think it’s necessary to give my phone number in order to register for a FREE app. I would prefer to register via email over anything else, or NOT HAVE to register & receive information.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD ITS A TRAP
attributes.review: i downloaded this app expecting to see my hot president and instead my phone was trying to kill me once i downloaded it. also the app told me it was going to kill Charli D’amelio and i was so horrified i deleted the app. -10/10 dont ever download this app or support this cheeto looking man.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: when i first opened the app i was greeted by this awful picture of Trumps Penis. disgusting. i went ahead and started looking around the app. took me forever to switch pages. this app is terrible and i do not recommend
